overview:
Jeffrey Reitman is Co-Founder and Chief Technology Officer at GoCrossCampus.

Jeffrey Reitman, a biomedical engineering major at Yale (SY ‘08), has been very involved in the Web 2.0 start up scene. In 2006, he worked with Sean Mehra to develop StudentPlanIt.com, an online calendaring network geared towards the college market. In 2007, he served as Co-Founder and Student Director to the Yale Entrepreneurial Institute Summer Incubator Program. Ultimately, it was his involvement in entrepreneurship at Yale that led him down the path of co-founding GoCrossCampus.com (GXStudios Inc.), an affinity-based massively multiplayer gaming platform. Jeffrey acts as CTO for the GXC team, which involves looking for new interesting technologies and acting as a project manager on many upcoming products.
